milestones.description: David Hookes has broken the record for most sixes (11) in ODIs for AUS, going past Rod Marsh's 10
Graham Yallop and David Hookes's 112-run partnership is AUS's highest for the 3rd wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 99 between Greg Chappell and Kim Hughes
